name: Shrubbersville
description:
Yadayadaya This is a boot from my old unused account @coderman8882 on scratch

Arrow Keys to Move

Click to Click

Space to mine things like trees and rocks

QA

Q:Smith the Table won't work!

A:Every word has a captial letter at the front, and the rest is lowercase

Q:I don't know any of these crafting recipes!!

A:Well if you combine an axe with any material other than stone you get a better axe, iron nugget and gold nugget together makes an astral shred, and if you combine that with an axe then you get astral axe

Q:Why is this game so bad?

A:Get a sense of perception of good games!

Q:Where do I put suggestions for the game?

A:The chat or my profile

Q:Is it spooky month?

A:YES!!
